These days you can invent a product, start a blog, sell shit online.

But if you're a Developer, you're gonna need to start with just ONE APP.

And if it's real enough and honest enough, and if it's made of everything it’s made you, where you come from, who you knew, your history, then you may have a chance at connecting with everyone else. And maybe that's your ticket to everything.

Track your health. Start with your heart.

Measures your heart rate throughout the day when you’re still. You can see these background heart rate measurements in the Health app on your Phone.
